com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class RedirectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractHttpService
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.RedirectService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpService, Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public class RedirectService
extends AbstractHttpService
    An HttpService that implements an HTTP redirection.

    This class will redirect requests from its bound Service path pattern to a new location pattern. Currently only these patterns are supported:

    • /new (no path parameters)
    • /new/{var1} (curly-brace style parameters)
    • /new/:var1/new/:var2 (colon style parameters)
    • http://host/new (full URL without path parameters)
    • http://host/new/{var1} (full URL with curly-brace style parameters)
    • http://host/new/:var1/new/:var2 (full URL with colon style parameters)
    The RedirectService will return 307 Temporary Redirect by default. 
    
 ServerBuilder sb = ...;
 sb.service("/old/", new RedirectService("/new"));
 sb.service("/old/{var}", new RedirectService("/new/{var}"));
 sb.service("/old/{var}", new RedirectService(ctx -> "/new/" + ctx.pathParam("var")));

 sb.service("/old/{var}", new RedirectService(HttpStatus.MOVED_PERMANENTLY, "/new/{var}"));
 sb.service("/old/{var}", new RedirectService("http://user:name@localhost:8080/search/{var}"));
